| HistoryText             = The United States Hulkbuster Force was created as a unit to fight hostile gamma mutates. They were first called upon to break up a fight between [[Gamma Flight (Alpha Flight Space Program) (Earth-616)|Gamma Flight]] and [[Skaar (Earth-616)|Skaar]] in [[Austin]], [[Texas (State)|Texas]]. However, Skaar attacked them for fun and easily overwhelmed them, though he didn't try to kill any of them.{{r|Gamma Flight Vol 1 2}}
